text:
Hi All, I have a friend who is building a content project ( <http://softwarelens.com|softwarelens.com> ) aiming to help people supercharge their marketing, sales, and service workflows. He is currently publishing interviews with smart professionals sharing how they use software tools to optimize their processes.

If you are interested in having your workflow automation story featured here - please DM and I’ll connect you.
